title: European Rugby Challenge Cup Table
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {37245=This week's Expert Witness, Kyran Bracken, reviews the November Tests., 24149=The 2016 Champions Cup and Challenge Cup finals will take place in Lyon, while Edinburgh will host the Champions Cup final in 2017., 38838=Keep up to date with the news during this year's November internationals., 24907=Montpellier, Harlequins and Cardiff Blues have all been drawn into the same pool for the 2015/2016 European Rugby Challenge Cup.}
